summary: The accounts package implements the core user management system for the Open Library platform, offering utilities to assume a user context, perform authentication, registration, profile updates, and integrate with Internet Archive credentials. It defines the data model and business logic for account activation, password handling, email verification, status tracking, and external profile linking, along with supporting helpers for hashing, UUID generation, and email delivery.
business_intent: Enable secure and reliable handling of Open Library user accounts throughout their lifecycle, facilitating login, account creation, verification, and synchronization with related services while maintaining data integrity and privacy.
